scripts.build:staging: sh ../bash-scripts/set-env-variables.sh staging && REACT_APP_ENV=staging npm run build
scripts.build:staging:windows: sh ../bash-scripts/set-env-variables.sh staging && set REACT_APP_ENV=staging&& npm run build
scripts.build:demo: sh ../bash-scripts/set-env-variables.sh demo && REACT_APP_ENV=demo npm run build
scripts.build:demo:windows: sh ../bash-scripts/set-env-variables.sh demo && set REACT_APP_ENV=demo&& npm run build
scripts.build:production: sh ../bash-scripts/set-env-variables.sh production && REACT_APP_ENV=production npm run build
scripts.build:production:windows: sh ../bash-scripts/set-env-variables.sh production && set REACT_APP_ENV=production&& npm run build
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:staging && aws s3 sync build/ s3://providers.test.cebroker.com
scripts.deploy:staging:windows: npm run build:staging:windows && aws s3 sync build/ s3://providers.test.cebroker.com
